attributes.action: provide full government backing to the WIPO copyright treaty to protect the interests of blind and disabled people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many large governments (including USA, Canada, EU) are currently backing the rights of publishers over the rights of disabled users at the 18th session of the Standing Committee on Copyright and Related Rights. The UK government should instead back the rights of disabled users.
